title: Shaun O'Hara's offensive line breakdown & Willie McGinest on the Patriots loss
itunes:title: Shaun O'Hara's offensive line breakdown & Willie McGinest on the Patriots loss
description:
Dave Dameshek leaves Studio 66 for Studio 6 where he sits down with another Cleveland Browns legend, Shaun O'Hara. Shaun kibitzes about why he still actively roots for the Giants (4:20), how the Giants issues have been more to do with the offensive line not Eli Manning (12:40) and his top offensive lineman in the NFL right now (30:15). Next, Shek invites Willie McGinest into his office for his Week 10 exit interview. Willie and Dave get into Tom Brady being the worst QB vs the blitz this season (51:00) and why Willie never wants guys who care only about money in his locker room (53:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
